1.content: Portal UGT TOWA - Complete PWA & Notification System Implementation
1.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Successfully implemented and deployed advanced PWA system with intelligent installation, complete notification system with admin panel, 25+ edge functions, zero TypeScript errors, and production-ready deployment at https://55g0csidwr93.space.minimax.io

2.content: URGENT: Fix Appointment Booking start_time Constraint Error
2.details: ✅ SOLVED: Successfully identified and fixed the null constraint violation in the appointment booking system. Added start_time and end_time fields to the INSERT statement in CitasPage.tsx. Applied corrections to all versions. Build completed successfully with 0 TypeScript errors. Deployed at https://xqmbk00ixzzy.space.minimax.io

3.content: Implement click-to-view functionality for event galleries
3.details: Users should be able to click on events in the gallery to open them in a fullscreen viewer with zoom controls, navigation, and download functionality.

4.content: Implement Document Viewer for Document Images and Text
4.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Successfully implemented comprehensive document viewer system allowing users to click on documents to view them in fullscreen modal. Features include: zoom controls (50%-200%), support for images and PDFs, download functionality, responsive design, and integration into both admin and affiliate interfaces. Deployed at https://i7bke2n2uozw.space.minimax.io

5.content: Setup Production VAPID Keys for Push Notifications
5.details: Configure production VAPID keys for secure push notification delivery. Current system has development keys - need production-ready keys for real-world deployment and proper notification delivery.

6.details: Add comprehensive analytics tracking and performance monitoring. Monitor user engagement, PWA installation rates, notification delivery rates, page load times, and user behavior patterns.

7.content: SEO Optimization and Search Engine Visibility
7.details: Enhance search engine optimization including meta tags, structured data, sitemap generation, robots.txt optimization, and Google Search Console integration for better discoverability.

8.content: Consider Native Mobile App Development with Capacitor
8.details: Evaluate the possibility of creating a native mobile app using Capacitor based on the existing PWA. This would provide app store distribution and enhanced mobile experience while maintaining the web-based architecture.
